caption.title: Recovery of TRIM25-mediated RIG-I ubiquitination by aptamers specific to NS1
caption.p: In vitro ubiquitination was detected by immunoblotting as described in Materials and Methods. In the presence of R-1 and R-2 aptamers, regular ubiquitination was occurred by suppressing the NS1 activity (lanes 4 and 5). Arrows indicate ubiquitinated bands.
